text:
Save the ﬁle with the ﬁlename monthly-car-sales.csv in your current working directory.
The dataset has 9 years, or 108 observations. We will use the last year or 12 observations as
the test set. The period of the seasonal component could be six months or 12 months. We
will try both as the seasonal period in the call to the exp smoothing configs() function when
preparing the model conﬁgurations.
4https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jbrownlee/Datasets/master/monthly-car-sales.csv
